attributes.action: to reconsider the withdrawal of funding from the ICELE.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The International Centre of Excellence for Local e-Democracy, through its e-Voice web-portal, has provided a simple route for local community groups and parish councils to publish community web-sites. The withdrawal of funding to the ICELE has put the e-Voice web-portal at risk, making it more difficult for local groups to publish their own local web-sites. We ask the Prime Minister to urgently reconsider the funding of this valued organisation.
